name: freudenberg:consulting
goal: freudenberg.consulting is a public-affairs agency based in Germany. It offers strategic consulting services and information of EU policy making.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Digital economy and society, Energy, Enlargement, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives:
The priorities are energy policy, climate policy, environment policy and cohesion policy.

The focus is on the following packages and the related dossiers : Clean Energy Package, Cyber Security Package,
Mobility Package, MFF
customers: European Federation of Local Energy Companies
